body: What is causing the low-frequency, undulating noise – like a car engine revving up – that my partner and I hear almost every night and sometimes during the daytime? We hear it wherever we are - at home or in compete isolation by the sea or in the countryside, far away from industry. It is not inside out heads – if we stuff our fingers in our ears, we cannot hear it.  G Bradley, Tiverton, Devon • Post your answers – and new questions – below or email them tonq@theguardian.com. Please include name, address and phone number.
webTitle: There's a noise I hear everywhere – and I don't know what it is
